metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7998 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The SPIP template composer/compiler in SPIP 3.1.2 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary PHP code by uploading an HTML file with a crafted (1) INCLUDE or (2) INCLURE tag and then accessing it with a valider_xml action.

criterions.comment: spip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.3-1').
